text: Hey guys
anyone have experience using the Forms API?
I’ve used them for some FE projects, try to ask

Thanks for the reply Guido :slightly_smiling_face: I'm trying to associate contacts to HubSpot campaigns through URL's with the `utm_campaign` query param, and I'm going to attempt to do this by submitting a form with the Forms API
Do you know if that's possible without needing to set up a Tracking URL? Is HubSpot able to do that or are there additional steps I'm missing from above

I think you can achive your goal passing the url of the page you what in the response…

So you payload would have: fields (the array of fields), context: { pageUri: url }
where `url` is the url you want to track
this `url`, is the one you can see into the form `submissions` under the `conversion page` column
idk if is what you want to do

hey Guido, thanks so much for your reply! If I'm hearing correctly, you're saying I can do this as long as I pass in the page URL when I make a request to the Forms API in the request payload.

I don't know what you mean in your last message. For additional context, I am not using a HubSpot page, but rather a custom page with a custom form

Yup, the documentation is good, I had no issue in implement it.
Btw, I was trying to tell you, that the `url` you will pass, will be the one you will see on the form HubSpot page under the `conversion page` column
btw, just try to pass the url you want to track into the context as pageUri
OK! :slightly_smiling_face:
I'll just try to do that
and I'll update you on if it worked or not
thanks so much for your help, it'd be awesome if we can help each other in the future on HubSpot issues ^_^ If there's something you're wondering about that I may know feel free to ask!
yeah, no prob
thx u :slightly_smiling_face:
There's no way to associate an existing contact with a Form submission?
to prevent creation of new HubSpot record when one already exists.. maybe the email field prevents that
hmm
